title: Oroville (California)
name: Feather Falls
directions: HWY 162 towards Berry Creek, right on Forbestown Rd., left on Lumpkin Rd., left just before town proper (there is a sign)
content: A great day hike for those wishing to see the 5th highest falls in the United States with a drop of 200m/640ft.  Great spot in the middle of the hike to see a massive ladybug migration.
